title: SSQ eSports Sister Team LF TOP Plat+

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Suicide Squad eSports (@SSQeSports). Suicide Squad - Oceania based eSport organisation. Australia

body:
Hi my name is Primal, I am both Captain and Manager of the SSQ eSports LoL Team.

Currently we are looking for a top to trial.
Requirements for application:
- Actively played through season 8
- Plat 4 rank minimum
- Previous team environment experience highly regarded
- Decent communication etiquette
- Willing to accept constructive criticism
- Appropriate attitude to improve

Contact me via League client, or join our Organisations [discord](https://discord.me/ssq) and ask for me, Primal, in the #joining-the-team text channel.

Also link me your OP.GG and top 5 most comfortable champions in order.
